metadata.name: Pacifist
metadata.description:
Make love, not war with Pacifist, a cut item from Repentance! Will you skip rooms in order to gain rewards?
[img]https://i.imgur.com/zx4jgfI.png[/img]
[b][h1]----------------------------- 𝐏𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐬𝐭 ----------------------------[/h1][/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xmBeV6I.png[/img] [i]Make love, not war[/i] | Quality: 2 [list] [*][u][b]Item Pools[/b][/u] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/rkmPKKx.png[/img] Angel [img]https://i.imgur.com/rkmPKKx.png[/img] [/list] [/list] [list] [*][u][b]Effects[/b][/u] [list] [*]Gives [b]pickup rewards[/b] at the start of a floor based on how many rooms the player [b]hasn't cleared[/b] on the previous floor [/list] [/list] [list] [*][u][b]Synergies[/b][/u] [list] [*][img]https://i.imgur.com/Dz63REn.png[/img] [b]Abyss[/b] = Spawns a locust that can [b]charm[/b] enemies on contact [/list] [/list] [b][h1]----------------------- 𝐌𝐨𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 ----------------------[/h1][/b][list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]External Item Descriptions[/url] (English [img]https://i.imgur.com/11ORCm6.png[/img] Español [img]https://i.imgur.com/BCCFhHE.png[/img] Pусский [img]https://i.imgur.com/vFcOh4w.png[/img]) [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362]Encyclopedia[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Minimap Items[/url] [/list] [img]https://i.imgur.com/9Lz5VfQ.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫, 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url] [*][u]𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url] [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kittenchilly]kittenchilly[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/3en8OyU.png[/img] [code]Aether, Akad, ALADAR, Andre Doruk, Blind the Bound Demon, Blixy, BrakeDude, cat,,, Firework, fly_6, Goncholito, im_tem, Kars, KitsuneMedia, kittenchilly, Kotry, lambchop_is_ok, Luigi124, Michael¿?, PixelPlz, poody_blue, Sillst, sinbiscuit, Soaring__Sky, The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/code]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]_Kilburn[/u] - For the original Pacifist concept [u]Preyn[/u] - For stylistic inspiration in the image gallery [u]All of you[/u] - For checking us out and supporting us :)[/code]
